data.eml:eml: The mesothoracic wings of Afrotropical Scutelleridae (Hemiptera: Heteroptera): morphology and taxonomic significance

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Czaja, Joanna (2013): The mesothoracic wings of Afrotropical Scutelleridae (Hemiptera: Heteroptera): morphology and taxonomic significance. Zootaxa 3616 (2): 101-118, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3616.2.1
